pages.text: YA ne opravdyvayu svoyu dushu, - ved' dusha pobuzhdayet ko zlu, yesli tol'ko ne pomiluyet Gospod' moy. Poistine, Gospod' moy proshchayushch. miloserd
I skazal tsar': "Privedite yego ko mne! YA voz'mu yego dlya sebya". I kogda on zagovoril s nim, to skazal: "Ty ved' segodnya u nas sil'nyy, doverennyy
On skazal: "Postav' menya nad sokrovishchnitsami zemli: ved' ya - khranitel', mudryy
I tak utverdili My Yusufa v zemle , chtoby on poselilsya tam, gde pozhelayet. My postigayem Svoim miloserdiyem, kogo pozhelayem, i ne gubim nagrady dobrodeyushchikh
Nagrada zhe budushchey zhizni - luchshe dlya tekh, kotoryye uverovali i byli bogoboyaznenny
I prishli brat'ya Yusufa i voshli k nemu, i uznali oni ikh, a oni yego ne uznavali
Kogda zhe on snaryadil ikh snaryazheniyem, skazal: "Privedite mne brata vashego ot ottsa. Razve vy ne vidite, chto ya polnost'yu dayu meru i ya - luchshiy iz dayushchikh priyut
A yesli vy ne privedete yego ko mne, to net mery dlya vas u menya i ne priblizhaytes' ko mne
Oni skazali: "My otvlechem ottsa ot nego, i my, konechno, tak sdelayem
I skazal on svoim slugam: "Polozhite tovar ikh v ikh v'yuki, - mozhet byt', oni uznayut, kogda vozvratyatsya k svoyey sem'ye, mozhet byt', oni vernutsya
I kogda oni vozvratilis' k ottsu, to skazali: "O otets nash! Otkazano nam v mere. Poshli s nami nashego brata, togda my poluchim meru. Poistine, my budem yego okhranyat'
